content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I am pleased to negotiate with you. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too low for the excellent location and amenities of the apartment. I am looking for a higher price that reflects the value of the property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Apologizing, but my circumstances demand a prudent choice. I'll consider alternate options, as this seems not to align with my financial situation. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
